introduction.heading: Data Commons
introduction.text: The UMCCR Data Commons supports the management, analysis and sharing of data for the research community.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The UMCCR Data Commons define the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Submit Data
buttons.body: Submit Data based on the dictionary.
buttons.label: Submit data

login.title: PORTAL IS IN STEP1 CONFIG MODE
login.subTitle: The University of Melbourne Centre for Cancer Research
login.text: PORTAL IS IN STEP1 CONFIG MODE. YOU CAN HOWEVER PERFORM SOME INITIAL DATA SUBMISSION
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact

security_quiz.title: BloodPAC User agreement
security_quiz.description: The agreement on what you can and need to do in a Commons.

questions.question: As a registered user, I can do the following things without any problem. Is it true or not:

questions.question: How can I share data with other people according to the policy of the commons
options: I can only share data with BPA memebers
